Articles.Content: I've been working on an RCS mod, and so far I have all the additional components I want worked out, but I still can't figure one thing out. I'm trying to make an RCS Module that runs on a different fuel source, however, if I just change the resource in the .cfg the module doesn't work, even if it's being supplied with the resource. Anyone know how to change the resource that ModuleRCS consumes?
The resource you change it to...is that ALL_VESSEL too, or STACK_PRIORITY_SEARCH? That might be the problem.

Yes, I added the resource under the general resources file, set to ALL_Vessel. Any other suggestions?

Edited October 11, 2013 by Netha
IIRC ialdabaoth was trying to do this too, and (I think?) eventually solved it. The answer might be in the Modular Fuels thread. Sorry I don't remember where, or if he ever posted how.

IIRC ialdabaoth was trying to do this too, and (I think?) eventually solved it. The answer might be in the Modular Fuels thread. Sorry I don't remember where, or if he ever posted how.

Actually he abandoned it because of trouble getting it to work with alternate resources.

However that might just have been getting it to work with MFT specifically and not RCS in general.... but I do know that he had trouble with it so it was deprecated.
